improvements.title: Add missing alt text to profile image on homepage
improvements.description: The profile image on the homepage (page.tsx) has alt text 'Angus Hally, out hiking in Wales' but could be more descriptive. Update it to include context about it being a profile photo.

improvements.title: Fix console.log statements in production code
improvements.description: Remove or convert console.log statements to proper error handling in next-ui/src/app/projects/habit/habit.ts. These logs are useful for debugging but should use proper logging in production.

improvements.title: Add loading state text to CV page
improvements.description: The CV page (cv/page.tsx) has loading spinners but no accompanying text. Add descriptive loading messages to improve UX.

improvements.title: Standardize button sizes in contact page
improvements.description: The contact page submit button uses size='md' while other pages use 'lg'. Standardize to 'lg' for consistency across the app.

improvements.title: Add missing TypeScript return type to resetCombobox
improvements.description: The resetCombobox function parameter in HabitCombobox.tsx doesn't have an explicit return type. Add 'void' return type for better type safety.

improvements.title: Update copyright year to be dynamic
improvements.description: The Data Value Game footer has a hardcoded year. Update DVGFooter.tsx to use dynamic year like 'const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear()'.

improvements.title: Add aria-label to social media icons on about page
improvements.description: Social media ActionIcons on the about page already have aria-label attributes, but we should verify they're descriptive enough. Update them to be more specific (e.g., 'Visit my LinkedIn profile').

improvements.title: Consolidate duplicate color definitions in CSS
improvements.description: The DataValueGame.css file has many color variables defined. Consider consolidating or documenting which colors are actively used vs deprecated.
